full_summary:
### Request for Quotations: Jira Reseller
### [Note]* Denotes Mandatory Fields

#### Solicitation Details

* Reference Number: MX-22774195581
* Solicitation Number: PS23-AG-005
* Publication Date: June 2, 2023
* Tender Closing Date: July 4, 2023, 16:00:00 Local Time (Saskatchewan)
* Amendment Number: 2
* Amendment Date: July 4, 2023

#### Contract Details

* The successful proponent will be required to provide licensing for Jira Software and Jira Align products.
* The contract duration is expected to be up to six years, with no options.

#### Contract Description

Farm Credit Canada (FCC), a Crown corporation, requires a licensed reseller to provide licensing for Jira Software and Jira Align products. The successful proponent must demonstrate their capability to provide licensing for both products.

#### Quotation Requirements

* The proponent acknowledges that they are a licensed reseller of Atlassian Products.
* The proponent confirms their ability to provide licensing for both Jira Software and Jira Align products.

#### Tendering Process

* This solicitation is subject to the provisions of Chapter 5 (Government Procurement) of the Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) and Chapter 19 (Government Procurement) of the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA).
* FCC is subject to the Official Languages Act (Canada), and proponents may choose to respond in either official language (English or French).
* The solicitation is non-binding and will be evaluated based on the proposal received. FCC reserves the right to cancel the solicitation at any time.

#### Contact Information

* Procurement and Vendor Manager: Adam Gottselig
* Email: procurement@fcc.ca
* Phone: (000) 000-0000

#### Tendering Documentation

* The solicitation documents, including all amendments, are available on MERX (https://www.merx.com).

#### Additional Information

* The solicitation is subject to the Official Languages Act and the Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement.
* FCC reserves the right to cancel the solicitation at any time.

You can reach out to the procurement contact listed above for more information on the solicitation. All proposals must be submitted electronically through MERX by the closing date and time specified. We look forward to receiving your quote! 

Keep in mind that my output should look more professional and
